name: legislation
content:

C2 a law or set of laws suggested by a government and made official by a parliament: [ + to infinitive ] The government has promised to introduce legislation to limit fuel emissions from cars.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are some ambiguities in the legislation.The effects of this legislation will extend further than the government intends.This legislation is designed to stimulate the faltering economy.Several governments have adopted tough new anti-terrorist legislation in the wake of the attacks.Such unpopular legislation is unlikely to be introduced before the next election.
